name: Kingdom of Lies (itch) (Sasha, Myleah, zebby, Adoxographist, matchai_kat, That Martin Guy, Kuri Videos, LadyJazzington, SeerofWords, illegalileo, CharCharChar)
name_original: Kingdom of Lies (itch) (Sasha, Myleah, zebby, Adoxographist, matchai_kat, That Martin Guy, Kuri Videos, LadyJazzington, SeerofWords, illegalileo, CharCharChar)
description:
Peer into a fairytale kingdom where everything is just a little bit off with this short, sweet kinetic novel about love, coming out, and being true to yourself. 

This game was made in two weeks for the Rainbow Game Jam 2021 and features original art and full voice acting.



Credits
